summary:
Tired of Skyrim armors for rushers and want an stealth and Dark Outfit? 
Tired of Shrouded/Nightingale Armor?
This mod is just for ya
descriptionHtml:
Hello Skyrim lovers, here is HayabusaBR with my first mod (i uploaded it earlier but deleted by some reasons, but there is)
Tired of Shrouded/Nightingale armor?
Want an armor to protect you and make you look like an assassin?
This mod is made for you
a fully craftable/temperable/enchantable armor set for the ones (like me) who like some \"Darker\" look for the Skyrim game.

How to get the armor?
Find it under Ebony Crafting, you will need ebony ingots, leather and leather straps


Bugs: I Haven\'t find any one yet, i u find, tell me

Credits: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/697469/]fume0101[/url] by the base script


If u want to modify the file, talk to the owner of that
author: fume0101 Edited by HayabusaBR

files.name: White variant of Fullpitch Armor set
